bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of conglomeration brought forth by the consumption of chicken eggs that fail to be digested. It was believed that the failure to digest chicken eggs resulted in the forming of lumps in the shape of fledglings. Hence the designation of this condition. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry su 蘇：蘇主雞瘕 , “ Su controls chicken conglomeration-illness ”.
